title: Underrated Damon Hill is one of Britain’s greatest
summary: So often treated as an afterthought among Britain’s Formula 1 champions, Damon Hill’s story proves he was anything but, asMatt Bishopexplains

qa_pairs.question: Which team did Damon Hill drive for when he won his Formula 1 World Championship?
What year did Damon Hill become the Formula 1 World Champion?
Damon Hill is the son of which famous Formula 1 driver?
